author: Patrick Hosken
title: Asher Angel Loves The ‘Summer Vibe’ Of Breezy ‘All Day’ And Thinks You Will, Too
description: Asher Angel moves into the club-ready realm with his breezy new single 'All Day.' He tells MTV News how it came together.
content:
In last year's crackling DC excursion Shazam!, Asher Angel's character could turn into an extremely buff, extremely powerful, lightning-wielding superhero played by Zachary Levi. It was a power he used, thankfully, for good.
But on "All Day," the newest tast… [+2262 chars]
